creditline: Gift of Richard and Linda Parins
description: 3 men standing around a small table, looking at papers, in front of a large machine in a factory; 2 other men standing on a platform at right, operating machinery
markings: \'DBAL0277\', in pencil, lower left corner, on back; untranslated stamp, in Russian, at lower right corner on back, \'PRINTED UNDER THE SUPERVISION OF/TATIANA BALTERMANTS/FROM a NEGATIVE BY/DMITRII BALTERMANTS/THIS IS PRINT NO. 22/25 [illegible signature]/[copyright] ESTATE OF DMITRII BALTERMANTS\', on stamp, at lower right corner, on back
title: Building Communism
